summary: SINCE 28,000 MI TRANSMISSION SLIPS FROM 1-2; TECHNICIAN FOUND ERROR BUT DEALER REFUSED PROBLEM. ERROR CODE SAYS INTERNAL SLIPPAGE. PROBLEMS GETS MUCH WORSE WITH COLD WEATHER. SOMETIMES DOESN'T SHIFT. HAS TO BE SHIFTED BACK INTO REVERSE AND BACK TO DRIVE.   *** TRANSMISSION DIP STICK AND TUBE  REPLACED 2 TIMES FROM CORROSION, RUSTED IN HALF AT 60,000 MILES.   *NLM
